storyInfo: Castle-3 spends a few hours alone outside with the Doctor on what he thinks is his very last day.

attributes.content: 6:29 A.M. \ Overcast
Confirming surroundings—3.79 kilometers away from cave-in site No. 1439.
attributes.name: Castle-3

attributes.content: Scanning nearby organisms—Eight workers belonging to Rhodes Island Engineering Department's emergency wrecking crew.
attributes.name: Castle-3

attributes.content: Safety level assessed at medium to low risk.
attributes.name: Castle-3

attributes.content: Doctor, this is the safest rest area.
attributes.name: Castle-3

attributes.content: Doctor, we're just about done cleaning up this area. Once the survey team up front sends us their geological report, we'll be ready to move.
attributes.name: Engineering Operator A

attributes.content: We're used to it. As long as Rhodes Island continues to sail, we'll run into all kinds of problems.
attributes.name: Engineering Operator A

attributes.content: And we always have to spend a few nights on emergency construction work to keep the ship's course clear.
attributes.name: Engineering Operator A

attributes.content: Besides, we have you here with us this time to help us inspect the unstable structures beforehand. That really helped with efficiency. My guess is we'll all get to head back to the ship to rest in just a few hours.
attributes.name: Engineering Operator A

attributes.content: Doctor, you must be tired too, no?
attributes.name: Engineering Operator A

attributes.content: Right, you too, Castle-3. You really saved the day!
attributes.name: Engineering Operator A

attributes.content: There are lots of sand beasts around here. If you weren't here, it would've been a lot of work to chase them away.
attributes.name: Engineering Operator A

attributes.content: I follow orders and ensure the safety of the Doctor and everyone else.
attributes.name: Castle-3

attributes.content: It's been three years since you joined Engineering, right?
attributes.name: Engineering Operator A

attributes.content: Correct. It has been three years, ten months, and nine days since Master Closure booted my upgraded system for the first time.
attributes.name: Castle-3

attributes.content: It's been that long? You've been around longer than most of us.
attributes.name: Engineering Operator A

attributes.content: Doctor, we're cooking breakfast right now. Want to join us?
attributes.name: Engineering Operator B

attributes.content: Castle-3, how about—
attributes.name: Engineering Operator B

attributes.content: Thanks, but I don't need any recharging yet.
attributes.name: Castle-3

attributes.content: Judging from my remaining power, I should stay operational for another eight hours and seventeen minutes.
attributes.name: Castle-3

attributes.content: H-Haha... I was going to ask if you want to help us heat up some frozen bacon. We usually work with THRM-EX.
attributes.name: Engineering Operator B

attributes.content: Regrettably, my model does not support such a function.
attributes.name: Castle-3

attributes.content: *Sigh*... Never mind, I came up with another idea.
attributes.name: Engineering Operator B

attributes.content: Hey, which one of you opened up Shaver's voice recorder?
attributes.name: Engineering Operator A

attributes.content: Hey, relax. I just needed some heat.
attributes.name: Engineering Operator B

attributes.content: That thing's older than any of us. One misstep could blow up the whole camp!
attributes.name: Engineering Operator A

attributes.options: Is this really a voice recorder?;That

attributes.content: Judging from the frequency of the outer shell's vibration, the equipment's internal wiring has greatly deteriorated. There is a small chance that it will self-combust.
attributes.name: Castle-3

attributes.content: Doctor, should I eliminate the threat?
attributes.name: Castle-3

attributes.content: '♪ Forever... and ever... I shall become an immortal gale...'
H-Hold that thing! I-Is it falling apart?
attributes.name: Engineering Operator B

attributes.content: '♪ Forever... and ever... I shall become an immortal wildfire...'
Somebody help me! I'm going deaf!
attributes.name: Engineering Operator A

attributes.content: Acknowledged.
attributes.name: Castle-3

attributes.content: Threat neutralized.
attributes.name: Castle-3

attributes.content: ...*Sigh*.
attributes.name: Engineering Operator A

attributes.content: Poor Shaver.
attributes.name: Engineering Operator B

attributes.content: Castle-3, is the voice recorder gone for good?
attributes.name: Engineering Operator A

attributes.content: I removed its power source.
attributes.name: Castle-3

attributes.content: Until it undergoes a systematic repair, I don't recommend using this piece of equipment.
attributes.name: Castle-3

attributes.content: Repair... If we could fix this thing, we would've done it a long time ago.
attributes.name: Engineering Operator A

attributes.content: To say nothing of Shaver himself.
attributes.name: Engineering Operator A

attributes.content: Sometimes, when things break down, they're gone for good. It doesn't matter how much we want to keep them around, there's not much we can do.
attributes.name: Engineering Operator A

attributes.content: Right, Doctor. Shaver left the voice recorder behind.
attributes.name: Engineering Operator A

attributes.content: Remember him? He helped Dylan fix the 'Bad Guy' back in Columbia.
attributes.name: Engineering Operator A

attributes.content: He was still okay then, but not long after he got back, his health took a turn for the worse, and he was gone after a few days.
attributes.name: Engineering Operator A

attributes.content: He was just some forty years old... Never mind. Let's not talk about this. When you have Oripathy, you know the day will come, sooner or later.
attributes.name: Engineering Operator A

attributes.content: Doctor, let's eat up.
attributes.name: Engineering Operator A

attributes.content: Yeah, time to dig in... The meat's cold, but it's fine. As long as we have something to eat.
attributes.name: Engineering Operator B

attributes.content: Forever... and ever...
attributes.name: Engineering Operator B

attributes.content: Knocking on the bowls and singing while you eat, huh? Where'd you learn that from? Shaver?
attributes.name: Engineering Operator A

attributes.content: He was full of pep when he was around, just like his voice recorder, right?
attributes.name: Engineering Operator B

attributes.content: I shall become an immortal wildfire...
attributes.name: Engineering Operator A

attributes.content: '♪ Forever... and ever... I shall become an immortal wildfire...'
Doctor, what is everyone doing?
attributes.name: Castle-3

attributes.content: I saw Operator Chiave do the same thing when I accompanied him on his missions.
attributes.name: Castle-3

attributes.content: But, Doctor, I cannot master this technique.
attributes.name: Castle-3

attributes.content: I understand the meaning behind these words thanks to Master Closure's language module.
attributes.name: Castle-3

attributes.content: However, I do not understand the difference between vocalizing these words rhythmically, with changes in frequencies, and saying them outright.
attributes.name: Castle-3

attributes.content: Immortal.
attributes.name: Castle-3

attributes.content: I cannot understand this word either.
attributes.name: Castle-3

attributes.content: Nothing is forever. Not even the sturdiest machines.
attributes.name: Castle-3

attributes.content: Castle-3, are you close by?
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: Yes, Chiave. The Doctor and I are here with the wrecking crew. Is everything going well with the survey team?
attributes.name: Castle-3

attributes.content: No issues here. I'm all ready to... Uh, I mean, the work here's almost done.
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: And uh, I kind of forgot my wrench. Think you can do me a solid and bring it over?
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: Chiave, if you don't have such an important tool on your person, how did you finish your work?
attributes.name: Castle-3

attributes.content: Ehh, don't worry about it.
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: Ahem, Castle-3, remember what we talked about yesterday—
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: You mean how you wanted to sign up for a long-term field operation, and you wanted me to accompany...
attributes.name: Castle-3

attributes.content: Right, right. Let's leave it there, though. The Doctor's here—
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: Doctor, I'm going to borrow Castle-3 for a bit. That okay with you?
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: Alright, I knew you wouldn't mind!
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: Castle-3, hurry over here. I'll be waiting for you up ahead—
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: Doctor, I'm off to get Chiave his tools. Would you rather stay here or come with me?
attributes.name: Castle-3

attributes.content: Very well, Doctor.
attributes.name: Castle-3

attributes.content: Is Castle-3 back yet?
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Time's almost up. He promised he'd come help me take care of this!
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: And how come Chiave was acting so weird when I asked him if he knew where Castle-3 was just now?
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Oh crap! Oh crap! He's not trying to elope with Castle-3, is he?!
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Doctor, I, Castle-3, am very glad to be able to go on this mission with you on this day.
attributes.name: Castle-3

attributes.content: Doctor, today is a special day to me.
attributes.name: Castle-3

attributes.content: Just as the operators said earlier, I've worked at Rhodes Island for a very long time.
attributes.name: Castle-3

attributes.content: Operation platforms of my model rarely function for much longer than this.
attributes.name: Castle-3

attributes.options: I can see that your body

attributes.content: Doctor, I've noticed you looking at my scars.
attributes.name: Castle-3

attributes.content: Would you like to know how they came to be?
attributes.name: Castle-3

attributes.content: I've had these scars for three years.
attributes.name: Castle-3

attributes.content: They were all left by different people. The very first one came from a young sniper operator.
attributes.name: Castle-3

attributes.content: Goddamned bandits... Why are there so many of them?
attributes.name: Sniper Operator

attributes.content: Hah... Another one!
attributes.name: Sniper Operator

attributes.content: Trying to take these from me? Over my dead body! *Cough*... Dammit, that slash probably got my lungs...
attributes.name: Sniper Operator

attributes.content: Castle-3...
attributes.name: Sniper Operator

attributes.content: Ready.
attributes.name: Castle-3

attributes.content: Come... come over here... Give me a hand...
attributes.name: Sniper Operator

attributes.content: I recommend you lie down and rest. I may be a combat platform, but even I can tell. With the state you are in, you are no longer fit for combat.
attributes.name: Castle-3

attributes.content: Lie down... huh? No, it's not time for me to lie down yet.
attributes.name: Sniper Operator

attributes.content: Castle-3, you wouldn't mind if I carved something into you, right?
attributes.name: Sniper Operator

attributes.content: Such minor cosmetic damage is not enough to affect my performance.
attributes.name: Castle-3

attributes.content: Though I cannot begin to understand the meaning behind your action.
attributes.name: Castle-3

attributes.content: Don't worry about it... *Cough*... Castle-3, you know that I'm about to die, right?
attributes.name: Sniper Operator

attributes.content: If you don't receive immediate treatment, your body functions will terminate within three to five hours.
attributes.name: Castle-3

attributes.content: Terminate, huh...? Yeah... That's right. For us humans, that's death.
attributes.name: Sniper Operator

attributes.content: You want me to lie down... and wait to meet my fate... I can't do that.
attributes.name: Sniper Operator

attributes.content: It's my last couple of hours, and I'm gonna hang on and make them count.
attributes.name: Sniper Operator

attributes.content: —Look at these hostiles. Not only are they stealing all of Rhodes Island's stuff, they're disrupting the lives of the people in the Infected villages.
attributes.name: Sniper Operator

attributes.content: That's why I'm taking them down before I die.
attributes.name: Sniper Operator

attributes.content: That's the third one.
attributes.name: Sniper Operator

attributes.content: One mark for one kill.
attributes.name: Sniper Operator

attributes.content: —And I'm trading my life for them.
attributes.name: Sniper Operator

attributes.content: They'll be a memento proving that my life and death, right up to my final moments... have been meaningful...
attributes.name: Sniper Operator

attributes.content: Huntingbow!
attributes.name: Castle-3

attributes.content: I took the operator onto my body and sped away. Regrettably, by the time I made it back to Rhodes Island, his physical functions had already ceased.
attributes.name: Castle-3

attributes.content: In more accurate terms, he reached 'death.'
attributes.name: Castle-3

attributes.content: Master Closure noticed the scars on my body. She was going to remove them, but I asked to keep them.
attributes.name: Castle-3

attributes.options: As a way to memorialize the operator?;As a way to memorialize the incident?

attributes.content: Sorry, Doctor. I do not understand the word 'memorialize.'
attributes.name: Castle-3

attributes.content: As a robot, as long as my core remains intact, the incident will remain in my memory bank. At the same time, all my data on Huntingbow will remain intact.
attributes.name: Castle-3

attributes.content: If you would like to know why I decided to keep these scars, I'm afraid it'll be difficult for me to give you an accurate answer.
attributes.name: Castle-3

attributes.content: However, Master Closure did propose one possibility—
attributes.name: Castle-3

attributes.content: She said this was a kind of 'imitation.'
attributes.name: Castle-3

attributes.content: Master Closure designed this particular module for us platforms in the hopes that we could behave as much like humans as possible.
attributes.name: Castle-3

attributes.content: Although I cannot fully comprehend the meaning behind Huntingbow leaving these marks, my program made me decide to preserve his action.
attributes.name: Castle-3

attributes.content: Ever since that incident, I've kept a record of the number of hostiles I personally defeat on field missions.
attributes.name: Castle-3

attributes.content: And afterwards, I ask my accompanying operators to carve the corresponding number on my outer shell.
attributes.name: Castle-3

attributes.content: Doctor, unlike THRM-EX, I cannot produce heat. My program does not support 'learning' either.
attributes.name: Castle-3

attributes.content: Today, I've arrived at a conclusion, albeit an imprecise one: the marks that Huntingbow left behind might be of a kind with Shaver's voice recorder.
attributes.name: Castle-3

attributes.content: Likewise, I will one day cease to function, and my scar-covered outer shell will remain for a period of time, whether in a landfill or in Master Closure's storage.
attributes.name: Castle-3

attributes.content: Thank you, Doctor.
attributes.name: Castle-3

attributes.content: When my core ceases to function, the data in my memory bank will also be wiped.
attributes.name: Castle-3

attributes.content: But your words for me today mean a lot.
attributes.name: Castle-3

attributes.content: Castle-3! Where are you?
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: The wrecking crew is gonna be here soon. And when they are, things aren't gonna be quite as easy!
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: Also, I just got a message from Closure. She asked if I'm with you...
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: Castle-3, if we don't run for it now, we're not gonna make it!
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: Chiave, I don't understand. What won't we make?
attributes.name: Castle-3

attributes.content: And I can hear a wrench. Does this mean you didn't actually need me to bring you tools?
attributes.name: Castle-3

attributes.content: That was just an excuse... Don't worry about it!
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: I heard from Closure that your core's just about busted. She's going to write you off soon, isn't she? Just like the cars with the busted engines that got written off at our factory!
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: If what you are asking is whether Master Closure will stop my functions today, that is possible.
attributes.name: Castle-3

attributes.content: Doctor, I should've explained this to you sooner, but I determined that the mission on hand had priority.
attributes.name: Castle-3

attributes.content: Until the very last moment, I, Castle-3, shall be your most steadfast ally.
attributes.name: Castle-3

attributes.content: Did I just hear the Doctor's voice...? Why is the Doctor there?
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: Castle-3, I told you to come alone!
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: If you brought the Doctor, how are we supposed to get away?!
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: Chiave, I already told you yesterday. It is nearly impossible for me to execute your suggestion that we go on this long term field mission together.
attributes.name: Castle-3

attributes.content: As a machine, my orders from Master Closure and the Doctor take first and foremost priority.
attributes.name: Castle-3

attributes.content: Furthermore, my core will not last much longer. You said we would go on a journey to multiple countries together, but I'm afraid that won't happen.
attributes.name: Castle-3

attributes.content: Even if we won't make it very far, we can still make a run for it!
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: The less time you have left, the more we should make the most of the present! It's much better to run away and die free than go back and get turned into a heap of garage scrap!
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: And if it comes down to it, I'll let Aosta give me an earful and Closure beat me up... but that all comes later!
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: Hey, Doctor, you say something too!
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: Transmission over.
attributes.name: Castle-3

attributes.content: Hey, Castle-3—
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: Doctor, my sensors have detected hostiles.
attributes.name: Castle-3

attributes.content: —Sand beasts. Four in total.
attributes.name: Castle-3

attributes.content: Castle-3, awaiting orders.
attributes.name: Castle-3

attributes.content: Understood!
attributes.name: Castle-3

attributes.content: Closest target down!
attributes.name: Castle-3

attributes.content: Doctor, there are still five sand beasts on the other side of the boulder behind us. They are charging toward us!
attributes.name: Castle-3

attributes.options: Castle-3, attack the rock face 30 degrees to the left ahead of us!

attributes.content: Understood!
attributes.name: Castle-3

attributes.content: The rock face is crumbling. Watch out, Doctor!
attributes.name: Castle-3

attributes.options: Disasters leave us more than just trouble sometimes.

attributes.content: Okay, Doctor. Climb onto me!
attributes.name: Castle-3

attributes.content: Doctor, hold still.
attributes.name: Castle-3

attributes.content: Castle-3, maximum velocity! Charge!
attributes.name: Castle-3

attributes.content: Doctor, we've escaped the sand beasts.
attributes.name: Castle-3

attributes.content: Doctor, please don't get down yet. As long as I maintain our current speed, we should reach the landship in ten minutes.
attributes.name: Castle-3

attributes.content: Doctor, I understand what Chiave meant.
attributes.name: Castle-3

attributes.content: He wants me to run free in my final moments.
attributes.name: Castle-3

attributes.content: Aren't we running right now, Doctor?
attributes.name: Castle-3

attributes.options: Indeed we are.;......;Those are some strong winds.

attributes.content: Doctor, I am very glad that I got the chance to run with you.
attributes.name: Castle-3

attributes.options: Immortal...;This seems like the right time for a song.;I shall become an immortal gale.

attributes.content: I shall become an immortal wildfire.
attributes.name: Castle-3

attributes.options: Castle-3, imitating others again?;......;Castle-3, you learned how to sing.

attributes.content: I can feel my wheels trampling upon the barrens, the winds beating against my outer shell...
attributes.name: Castle-3

attributes.content: And electric currents running through my core.
attributes.name: Castle-3

attributes.content: Doctor, I can feel rhythm now, thanks to you!
attributes.name: Castle-3

attributes.content: I can use my electric currents to accompany you as you sing—
attributes.name: Castle-3

attributes.content: '♪ I shall become an immortal wildfire.'
'♪ I shall become an immortal gale.'
'♪ From my ribs dash forth a herd of burdenbeasts,'
'♪ making their way across the barrenlands with pride.'
Castle-3... Huh? Doctor?
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Master Closure, I'm not late, am I?
attributes.name: Castle-3

attributes.content: Of course not, Castle-3. You're always on time!
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Very well, Master. From the beginning until the very end, Castle-3 has never disappointed you.
attributes.name: Castle-3

attributes.content: Before I head into the workshop with you, I would like to say a few words to the Doctor.
attributes.name: Castle-3

attributes.content: Sure thing. I'm in no rush.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: —Doctor.
attributes.name: Castle-3

attributes.content: Thank you for choosing Castle-3.
attributes.name: Castle-3

attributes.content: It has been my pleasure to fight the battles I fought alongside you.
attributes.name: Castle-3

attributes.content: Castle-3, entering sleep mode.
attributes.name: Castle-3

attributes.content: Castle-3...?
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: He shut himself off... Doctor, what did you guys do today?
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.options: We finished a mission together.;We went on an adventure together.;We sang a song together.

attributes.content: I can't really pinpoint what feels off about this...
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Castle-3's still Castle-3. He's not like Lancet-2, who says some pretty sentimental things every now and then. Definitely not like THRM-EX, who gives me a scare every time I turn around.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: If I gotta say... it feels like he's a little cooler?
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.options: Perhaps he learned the concept of

attributes.content: Ehhh?!
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Doctor, I'm shocked, but I'm not sure it's because you saw all that in Castle-3 or because Castle-3 showed you all that!
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: I sometimes get this feeling...
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: When the smart robots use our language and try to understand our thoughts and actions, are we also looking at ourselves through them?
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Whoa, look at me talking about something this deep. That's really not like me. Dr. {@nickname}, you sure you don't wanna study A.I. with me?
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Hm... Talking to you about this gave me a new idea... Doctor, I'm taking Castle-3 with me. Work's gonna be such a pain today!
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Hey, Doctor!
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: Look who's here—
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: Castle-3, awaiting your command.
attributes.name: Castle-3

attributes.content: I've already completed three self inspections. No file loss detected.
attributes.name: Castle-3

attributes.content: Guess running all the way back here really paid off, huh...? That was exhausting.
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: I was just hoping to keep Castle-3 around for a little longer, but he'd already been torn apart by the time I made it back, and so I...
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.options: You got a little too anxious?;......;You started crying?

attributes.content: ...I almost yelled at Closure.
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: Chiave, according to the accounts of the Engineering operators, your actions cannot simply be described as 'almost.' Not even the profanity collection in my memory bank can make sense of the language you used...
attributes.name: Castle-3

attributes.content: Enough. Stop it there. I was worried about you!
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: That whack on the head Closure gave me still hurts like hell... but I don't regret it one bit.
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: The few of you are my dearest lackeys on this island, just a step below Aosta and Broca. I won't let any of you disappear on my watch!
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: Thank you, Chiave. You are my dearest lackey too.
attributes.name: Castle-3

attributes.content: Now that's more like it.
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: Wait, hold up. Who's your lackey? Where'd you learn that?!
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: I don't remember Closure or me changing your personality up...
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: Chiave, I don't have the ability to 'learn.'
attributes.name: Castle-3

attributes.content: Okay, okay, whatever. Anyway, Doctor, this guy had to go straight to you the moment he woke up. He just had to tell you he's okay.
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: So I guess we were mistaken. Closure had a whole upgrade system prepared for him, and it's enough to keep Castle-3's core running for—
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: I have no idea how long, but I'm sure he's got more time left than I do.
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: Chiave, I trust that you will still be able to run freely for a long time.
attributes.name: Castle-3

attributes.content: After all, we will be here with the Doctor, and the Doctor will always be there for us—
attributes.name: Castle-3

attributes.content: Right, Doctor, Master Closure added a jukebox function to my capabilities, and Chiave updated my repertoire. I can sing many more songs now.
attributes.name: Castle-3

attributes.content: —Would you like to listen to 'The Magnificent Sight After the Volcano Erupts,' or 'You Taste So Good?'
attributes.name: Castle-3
